SELECT t1.account_id AS accountId, t1.account_name AS accountName, t1.real_name AS realName, t1.mobile, t1.email, t1.role_id AS roleId, t2.role_name AS roleName, t2.is_admin AS isAdmin FROM auth_account t1 LEFT JOIN auth_role t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id AND t2.is_active = 1 WHERE t1.is_active = 1
and t1.account_name like '%${accountName}%'
and t1.mobile=#{mobile}
and t1.email like '%${email}%'
and t1.real_name like '%${realName}%'
and t1.role_id=#{roleId}
ORDER BY t2.is_admin DESC,t1.create_time DESC

select a.resource_id resourceId,a.resource_key resourceKey,a.resource_name resourceName,a.resource_url resourceUrl,a.icon icon,a.parent_id parentId,a.order_num orderNum from auth_resource a left join auth_role_resource b on a.resource_id = b.resource_Id and b.is_active = 1 left join auth_role c on b.role_id = c.role_id and c.is_active = 1 left join auth_account d on c.role_id = d.role_id and d.is_active = 1 where d.account_name = #{name}
